name: upper abdominal lymphadenopathy
description: Refers to the enlargement of lymph nodes in the upper abdominal region, which can be detected via imaging modalities. In radiologic evaluation, it is characterized by the presence of enlarged lymph nodes with a short-axis diameter typically greater than 1 cm on cross-sectional imaging, with CT and MRI
